addPath(String, String) - Static method in class io.robusta.rra.utils.StringUtils
Returns the concatenation of the absolute and relative paths, adding a "/" character between them if needed Calling addPath(uri, "/") ensures that the path will finish with only one "/" (as long as uri doesn't finishes with more than one "/")
